channel.title: Blog on Hege
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Hege

item.title: This Week in $HEGE: ❤️ Capitoday!
item.description: As the claws of crypto winter eased their grip a little bit, Hege made a debut on Capitoday’s new shill spaces. Welcome to This Week in $HEGE!

item.title: This Week in $HEGE: Rep by Rep
item.description: Bear markets are for building, which is exactly what our boy Hege has been up to. Rep by rep. Welcome to This Week in $HEGE!

item.title: This Week in $HEGE
item.description: Stop doomscrolling you monkeybrain. Tune in to the Hege vibe and join the Hege Royale fun instead. Welcome to This Week in $HEGE!

item.title: This Week in $HEGE
item.description: In this inaugural update for 2026, two new banger sets dropped on DRiP, a fresh banner made an entrance, and an NFT competition is underway. Welcome to This Week in $HEGE!

item.title: This Week in $HEGE
item.description: As the tentacles of the cabal plague have reached every corner of the ecosystem, an unlikely hero rises to the challenge. Welcome to This Week in $HEGE!

item.title: This Week in $HEGE
item.description: As December darkness descends over the northern hemisphere, cozy up for a Hege Royale duke-out, and sip on the latest DRiP set. Welcome to This Week in $HEGE!

item.title: This Week in $HEGE
item.description: As people were busy stuffing themselves with turkey and hunting for Black Friday bargains, Hege dropped a new snapshot on DRiP. Welcome to This Week in $HEGE!

item.title: This Week in $HEGE
item.description: As even good earnings from Nvidia failed to lift markets, Hege continued to up the meme game. Welcome to This Week in $HEGE!

item.title: This Week in $HEGE
item.description: Bitcoin is stumbling, but Hege stands firm, literally spreading light in the world. Welcome to This Week in $HEGE!

item.title: This Week in $HEGE
item.description: As AI jitters shaked the market, Hegends NFTs entered Magic Eden’s Gold Packs, and Hege memes spread into normie-space. Welcome to This Week in $HEGE!

item.title: This Week in $HEGE
item.description: As Powell threw a bucket of ice on the market party, Hege dropped a Halloween-themed snapshot on DRiP, and the Hege Mania game went live. Welcome to This Week in $HEGE!

item.title: This Week in $HEGE
item.description: While crypto markets stabilized, Hege steamed on, launching the Hege DAO, and taking a spot on the exclusive day 1 release of the PSG1 with Hege Dash. Welcome to This Week in $HEGE!

item.title: How To Become a Member of the Hege DAO
item.description: Become a member of the Hege DAO to get a direct voice in the future of Hege. If you deposit $HEGE tokens, you can vote on how project funding is spent, and also submit your own requests for funding.

item.title: How To Create a Poll in the Hege DAO
item.description: Learn how to create a poll proposal for getting the opinion from members in the Hege DAO.

item.title: How To Create a Proposal in the Hege DAO
item.description: As a member of the Hege DAO, you can create proposals to unlock treasury funds. Learn how to do it in this article!

item.title: How To Create a Spending Request in the Hege DAO
item.description: Learn how to create a spending request for unlocking funds in the Hege DAO.

item.title: How To Deposit and Withdraw $HEGE From the Hege DAO
item.description: Learn how to deposit and withdraw $HEGE from the Hege DAO.

item.title: How To Use the Hege DAO
item.description: Welcome to the definitive guide for using the Hege DAO.

item.title: How To Vote in the Hege DAO
item.description: Learn how to vote in the Hege DAO to give your voice in the future direction of Hege.

item.title: How To Write a Good Proposal for the Hege DAO
item.description: Learn how to write a good proposal to request funding from the Hege DAO.

item.title: This Week in $HEGE
item.description: As the crypto market struggled to regain its footing after last week’s flash crash, Hege dropped a fresh DRiP snapshot, and made a debut on mattle.fun. Welcome to This Week in $HEGE!

item.title: This Week in $HEGE
item.description: Overshadowed by the biggest wipeout in crypto history, Hege plotted out the course for October, and the BuyBot treasure hunt is on. Welcome to This Week in $HEGE!

item.title: The Hege BuyBot Treasure Hunt is On!
item.description: To celebrate the launch of the new Hege BuyBot in our Hegequarters Telegram channel, we’re organizing a BuyBot treasure hunt!

item.title: This Week in $HEGE
item.description: As doom-and-gloom swung to LFG, The HEGE Experience Vol. 1 premiered, and Hege Jetpack Madness entered app stores. Welcome to This Week in $HEGE!

item.title: This Week in $HEGE
item.description: As fear gripped the crypto market and traders got liquidated left and right, Hege BuyBot made an entrance in Hegequarters, and a fresh snapshot dropped on DRiP. Welcome to This Week in $HEGE!

item.title: Where We've Been and Where We're Going
item.description: “If there will be a survivor in the meme slaughter, it will be Hege. And what happens when the whole competition is dead and you have been building for a year?” Well guess what!

item.title: This Week in $HEGE
item.description: Rate cuts are here! Meanwhile the Hege’s Multiverse snapshot finished on DRiP, as rumors of a new Hege Telegram buybot made their way into the Hegequarters. Welcome to This Week in $HEGE!

item.title: This Week in $HEGE
item.description: As stock markets reached new highs and bitcoin rallied, the winners in the Hege Sticker Contest were announced, and the League of Hegends got a new member. Welcome to This Week in $HEGE!

item.title: This Week in $HEGE
item.description: While markets hyperfocused on jobs jobs jobs, a unique Rogue Hegend was generously given away, and a dope Hege animation was dropped by one of our community members. Welcome to This Week in $HEGE!

item.title: This Week in $HEGE
item.description: As markets were occupied with the latest Nvidia earnings and inflation numbers, a fresh Hege snapshot was launched on DRiP, and Hege Dash is being ported to the new Play Solana gaming console. Welcome to This Week in $HEGE!

item.title: This Week in $HEGE
item.description: While all eyes were on Mr. Powell speaking at Jackson Hole, Hege announced taking over a popular memecoin subreddit, and a new Hegend was welcomed into the League of Hegends. Welcome to This Week in $HEGE!

item.title: This Week in $HEGE
item.description: As more signs of an incoming altseason appeared at the horizon, the Hege Merch Store received updates and discounts, and the community-organized Hege merch competition continued. Welcome to This Week in $HEGE!

item.title: Hello, Hege Plushie!
item.description: After traveling around half the globe, the Hege Plushie finally made it into the Hege Merch Store. Go check it out and grab yours before they’re gone!

item.title: This Week in $HEGE
item.description: As more signs of an incoming altseason appeared at the horizon, the Hege Merch Store received updates and discounts, and the community-organized Hege merch competition continued. Welcome to This Week in $HEGE!

item.title: This Week in $HEGE
item.description: While the markets threw a little tantrum over tariff news, the $HEGE sticker contest continued, and the first ever Hege Hangouts weekly community call was held. Welcome to This Week in Hege!

item.title: How To Buy $HEGE in 4 Easy Steps
item.description: In this easy to follow tutorial you will learn how to download the Phantom Wallet, fund it with SOL, and then swap your SOL into HEGE.

item.title: This Week in $HEGE
item.description: As bitcoin tried to decide which way it wants to go, Hege kept moving and announced the new League of Hegends to honor our amazing contributors. Welcome to This Week in Hege.

item.title: Announcing: the League of Hegends
item.description: Today, Hege is proud to introduce a new way of showing respect to our awesome contributors: the League of Hegends — an ever-growing digital monument to honor all the amazing people who made Hege possible.

item.title: $HEGE Sticker Contest
item.description: That’s right, a new sticker contest — about time huh!?! Spread the Hege love by slapping stickers around the globe and win fine $HEGE prizes. You have until end of August, so get on it!

item.title: This Week in $HEGE
item.description: As bitcoin confirmed its breakout and the US passed landmark crypto legislation, Hege started the July marketing campaign by setting off a sticker contest, dropping a big set of dope summer merch, and more. Welcome to this week in Hege!

item.title: This Week in $HEGE
item.description: As bitcoin bulls finally got the overhand and charged ahead, Hege leveled up by announcing a multi-pronged marketing campaign to kick off on July 14. Welcome to this week in Hege!

item.title: Hege July Marketing Campaign
item.description: Starting July 12, HEGE is launching a coordinated marketing campaign designed to build momentum through the rest of the month and finally leave the $10M market cap behind us once and for all. Here’s what we have planned!

item.title: This Week in $HEGE
item.description: While bitcoin bulls and bears were fighting it out over new all time highs, the brand new Hege Blog went live, a Hege Heroes drop appeared on DRiP, and raiders went hard in the latest competition.

item.title: Welcome To the Hege Blog!
item.description: Team Hege is proud to announce the brand new Hege Blog. Tune in for weekly project updates, awesome artwork, competition announcements, and more.

item.title: This Week in $HEGE
item.description: Disasterpiece winners were announced, a new Hegend tee dropped in the Merch Store, and a new raid bot made its entrance into Hegequarters.

item.title: This Week in $HEGE
item.description: Finally, after months of work behind the scenes, we’re so proud to unveil our new Hege Merch Store!

item.title: This Week in $HEGE
item.description: Markets have been on a roller-coaster, but Hege steadily keeps building. This week, $HEGE trading went live on BiFinance, Reddit competition winners were selected, and a new competition was announced.

item.title: This Week in $HEGE
item.description: $HEGE listing on BiFinance officially announced, Reddit lighting up with competition posts, merch store update, and more.

item.title: This Week in $HEGE
item.description: $HEGE listing on BiFinance officially announced, Reddit lighting up with competition posts, merch store update, and more.

item.title: Welcome to This Week in $HEGE!
item.description: Good afternoon fellow Hegends and welcome to the first weekly Hege project update!
